attributes.action: Make signing e-Petitions easier by setting up accounts
attributes.additional_details: It currently takes a lot of effort to sign up to the petitions on this website. Setting up personal accounts on this site could make the process a lot easier. Once signed in it would mean that we would be able to simply click on "Sign This Petition" button, and it would be done. No more filling in forms for every petition. The e-petition site would be more likely to be viewed. The petitions would be more likely to be signed by people that care.
